_items.title: graphic first page
_items.body: To the Flipper component! this is body

_items.title: Only 12??
_items.body: This should be more than plenty. If not, you should probably consider using a different component or splitting your content up.

_items.title: To infinity...
_items.body: ...and beyond. When you reach the end you can simply start again.

_items.title: Usage
_items.body: Whilst you can include graphics, this element is useful for making text lists a bit more interesting.
